1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | RDF-to-Koshucode conversion
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF
7  ( judgesFromRdf,
8    judgeFromTriple,
9    RDFTupleType (..),
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Data.RDF              as RDF
13import qualified Data.Text             as Tx
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type  as T
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data  as D
16
17-- | Type of conversion
18data RDFTupleType
19    = RDFTuple2   -- ^ Binary relation: @\/s@ subject and @\/o@ object.
20    | RDFTuple3   -- ^ Ternary relation: @\/s@ subject, @\/p@ predicate, and @\/o@ object.
21      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord, Enum, Bounded)
22
23-- | Convert RDF graph to list of judges.
24judgesFromRdf :: (RDF.RDF g, D.CText c) => RDFTupleType -> g -> [T.Judge c]
25judgesFromRdf k g = map (judgeFromTriple k) $ RDF.triplesOf g
26
27-- | Convert RDF triple to affirmed judge.
28judgeFromTriple :: (D.CText c) => RDFTupleType -> RDF.Triple -> T.Judge c
29judgeFromTriple RDFTuple2 (RDF.Triple s p o) =
30    T.affirm (nodeString p) [("s", the s), ("o", the o)]
31judgeFromTriple RDFTuple3 (RDF.Triple s p o) =
32    T.affirm "RDF" [("s", the s), ("p", the p), ("o", the o)]
33
34the :: (D.CText c) => RDF.Node -> c
35the = D.pText . nodeString
36
37nodeString :: RDF.Node -> String
38nodeString = Tx.unpack . nodeText
39
40nodeText :: RDF.Node -> Tx.Text
41nodeText (RDF.UNode t)    = t
42nodeText (RDF.BNode t)    = t
43nodeText (RDF.BNodeGen _) = ""
44nodeText (RDF.LNode c)    = literalText c
45
46literalText :: RDF.LValue -> Tx.Text
47literalText (RDF.PlainL  t)   = t
48literalText (RDF.PlainLL t _) = t
49literalText (RDF.TypedL  t _) = t
50
